ai_debug_los.help_text: NPC Line-Of-Sight debug mode. If 1, solid entities that block NPC LOC will be highlighted with white bounding boxes. If 2, it'll show non-solid entities that would do it if they were solid.

ai_expression_frametime.help_text: Maximum frametime to still play background expressions.

ai_expression_optimization.help_text: Disable npc background expressions when you can't see them.

ai_show_hull_attacks.help_text: Show AI hull traces for melee attacks. 1 = show them for attacks, 2 = show them for tests.

async_mode.help_text: Set the async filesystem mode (0 = async, 1 = synchronous)

async_serialize.help_text: Force async reads to serialize for profiling

async_simulate_delay.help_text: Simulate a delay of up to a set msec per file operation

bot_mimic.help_text: Bot uses usercmd of player by index.

buddha.help_text: Player takes damage but won't die

cc_norepeat.help_text: In multiplayer games, don't repeat captions more often than this many seconds.

cl_clock_correction.help_text: Enable/disable clock correction on the client.

cl_clock_correction_adjustment_max_amoun.help_text: Sets the maximum number of milliseconds per second it is allowed to correct the client clock. It will only correct this amount if the difference between the client and server clock is equal to or larger than cl_clock_correction_adjustment_max_offset.

cl_clock_correction_adjustment_max_offse.help_text: As the clock offset goes from cl_clock_correction_adjustment_min_offset to this value (in milliseconds), it moves towards applying cl_clock_correction_adjustment_max_amount of adjustment. That way, the response is small when the offset is small.

cl_clock_correction_adjustment_min_offse.help_text: If the clock offset is less than this amount (in milliseconds), then no clock correction is applied.

cl_clock_correction_force_server_tick.help_text: Force clock correction to match the server tick + this offset (-999 disables it).

cl_clock_showdebuginfo.help_text: Show debugging info about the clock drift.

cl_clockdrift_max_ms.help_text: Maximum number of milliseconds the clock is allowed to drift before the client snaps its clock to the server's.

cl_clockdrift_max_ms_threadmode.help_text: Maximum number of milliseconds the clock is allowed to drift before the client snaps its clock to the server's.

cl_cmdrate.help_text: Max number of command packets sent to server per second

cl_connectionretrytime_p2p.help_text: Number of seconds over which to spread retry attempts for P2P.

cl_consistencycheck_interval.help_text: Perform a consistency check after this amount of time (seconds) has passed since the last.

cl_downloadfilter.help_text: Determines which files can be downloaded from the server (all, none, nosounds)

cl_flushentitypacket.help_text: For debugging. Force the engine to flush an entity packet.

cl_ignorepackets.help_text: Force client to ignore packets (for debugging).

cl_jiggle_bone_sanity.help_text: Prevent jiggle bones from pointing directly away from their target in case of numerical instability.

cl_log_tick.help_text: Log when a tick is recieved

cl_log_tick_skips.help_text: Log when the tick delta >= this

cl_particle_fallback_base.help_text: Base for falling back to cheaper effects under load.

cl_particle_fallback_multiplier.help_text: Multiplier for falling back to cheaper effects under load.

cl_particle_sim_fallback_base_multiplier.help_text: How aggressive the switch to fallbacks will be depending on how far over the cl_particle_sim_fallback_threshold_ms the sim time is.  Higher numbers are more aggressive.

cl_particle_sim_fallback_threshold_ms.help_text: Amount of simulation time that can elapse before new systems start falling back to cheaper versions

cl_playback_screenshots.help_text: Allows the client to playback screenshot and jpeg commands in demos.

cl_resend.help_text: Delay in seconds before the client will resend the 'connect' attempt

cl_retire_low_priority_lights.help_text: Low priority dlights are replaced by high priority ones

cl_showdemooverlay.help_text: How often to flash demo recording/playback overlay (0 - disable overlay, -1 - show always)

cl_spectator_cmdrate_factor.help_text: Rate multiplier when connected via hltv

cl_timeout.help_text: After this many seconds without receiving a packet from the server, the client will disconnect itself

cl_updaterate.help_text: Number of packets per second of updates you are requesting from the server

clientport.help_text: If non-empty, client binds port to specific address.  Usually you should leave this blank to use a different random system-assigned port for each connection.

commentary_available.help_text: Automatically set by the game when a commentary file is available for the current map.

con_logfile_suffix.help_text: Suffix to append to the console log, may be changed to reopen the log

convars_echo_toggle_changes.help_text: Echo to the console changes caused by toggling.

debugoverlay_draw_current.help_text: Tell debugoverlay to not draw any entries that have aged out by the time of rendering. Useful if sim runs more often than rendering.

debugoverlay_ignore_source.help_text: Draw everything normal and ignore the source for rendering

debugoverlay_show_text_outline.help_text: Toggle display of box around text

demo_avellimit.help_text: Angular velocity limit before eyes considered snapped for demo playback.

demo_fastforwardfinalspeed.help_text: Go this fast when starting to hold FF button.

demo_fastforwardramptime.help_text: How many seconds it takes to get to full FF speed.

demo_fastforwardstartspeed.help_text: Go this fast when starting to hold FF button.

demo_flush.help_text: Flush writing the demo file every network update

demo_interplimit.help_text: How much origin velocity before it's considered to have 'teleported' causing interpolation to reset.

demo_interpolateview.help_text: Do view interpolation during dem playback.

demo_pauseatservertick.help_text: Pauses demo playback at server tick

demo_recordcommands.help_text: Record commands typed at console into .dem files.

demo_usefastgoto.help_text: Use fast frame skipping when available for demo_goto commands.

demo_writefullupdate_rate.help_text: Interval time in seconds to write full updates to demo.

disable_dynamic_prop_loading.help_text: If non-zero when a map loads, dynamic props won't be loaded

dota_allow_pause_in_match.help_text: Allow players to pause in matchmade games

dota_announcer_idle_speech_deathwait.help_text: This many seconds must pass after a hero dies for an announcer to consider saying idle lines.

dota_announcer_idle_speech_debug.help_text: If true print debug information about why announcers do or do not idle.

dota_announcer_idle_speech_herodamage_li.help_text: If any hero has taken more than this many hitpoints of damage recently, no idles play.

dota_announcer_idle_speech_herodamage_wi.help_text: If any hero has taken more than dota_announcer_idle_speech_herodamage_limit hitpoints of damage in this many seconds, no idles play.

dota_announcer_idle_speech_interval.help_text: After an announcer has said an idle line, another can't play for at least this many seconds.

dota_announcer_idle_speech_minwait.help_text: Announcers won't say idle speech unless at least this many seconds passed since the last time they said something.

dota_announcer_idle_speech_starttime.help_text: This many seconds must have passed since start of game before announcers poll for idle speech.

dota_auto_surrender_all_disconnected_tim.help_text: If all players have been disconnected for at least N seconds, end the game immediately

dota_bot_force_pick.help_text: Force bots to pick one of these heroes before falling back to random selection (should be a comma-separated list with no spaces)

dota_bot_level.help_text: If set, bots will be set to the level specified with appropriate gold on game start

dota_bot_practice_difficulty.help_text: Default difficulty for quick bot practice games

dota_bot_practice_gamemode.help_text: Default game mode for bot practice games, AP = 1

dota_bot_practice_script.help_text: Bot script ID (as a string) to use for local games.

dota_bot_practice_select_hero.help_text: Force selection of a hero for the human player in practice games.

dota_bot_practice_start.help_text: Whether to start a local game when the map loads

dota_bot_practice_team.help_text: Default team for quick bot practice games

dota_building_health_loss_warn_interval.help_text: Minimum seconds between announcer warning a particular building is under attack

dota_combatlog_fight_idle_time.help_text: The amount of time needed to determine a fight is over (no one involved in a fight did anything to anyone else involved in the fight).

dota_damage_flash.help_text: Flash when enemies take damage from the player

dota_daynightcycle_pause.help_text: 0 = resume day/night cycle; 1 = pause day/night cycle; default = 0;

dota_easybuy.help_text: Everything is free, all shops are in range, and you can purchase for other heroes

dota_effective_creep_spawn_time.help_text: If non-zero, the time the creep spawner uses for deciding what to spawn

dota_entity_count_grace_threshold.help_text: Number of entities to reserve when we're getting close to the limit. Stops some entities from spawning.

dota_experimental_stats_interval.help_text: Seconds between each experimental stat update.

dota_fantasy_stat_update_interval_s.help_text: How often the server updates the GC with player fantasy stats

dota_force_bot_cycle.help_text: Set automatically by matchmaking to fill slots with bots

dota_force_gamemode.help_text: Force the game mode to a specific one. AP = 1, CM = 2, RD = 3, SD = 4. INTRO = 6. 7 = HW. 8 = REVERSE CM. 9 = XMAS

dota_force_upload_match_stats.help_text: If enabled, server will upload match stats even when there aren't human players on each side

dota_fountain_idle_minimum_time.help_text: How long into the game we need to be before we boot players for being intentionally Idle.

dota_gamemode_ability_draft_per_player_t.help_text: Total time in seconds a player has to draft an ability

dota_gamemode_ability_draft_pool_hero.help_text: Forced hero id to be in the ability pool

dota_hero_undying_max_zombies.help_text: Maximum amount of zombies that can be spawned.

dota_hide_wearables.help_text: If set, wearables (default body parts) will be hidden. This is for the item icon editor.

dota_idle_time.help_text: How long a player needs to be idle before he counts as disconnected.

dota_lenient_idle_time.help_text: How long a player needs to be idle before he counts as disconnected during the end stages of the game.

dota_max_courier_purchase_limit.help_text: Maximum allowed couriers per player (purchasing disallowed when reached)

dota_max_disconnected_time.help_text: How long a player needs to be disconnected before he counts as a leaver and gets punished.

dota_max_hero_select_time.help_text: How long a player has to choose their hero before being marked as AFK.

dota_max_pets.help_text: Number of pets allowed in a single match.

dota_max_physical_items_drop_limit.help_text: Maximum allowed physical items on ground per player for split items (tango/wards)

dota_max_physical_items_purchase_limit.help_text: Maximum allowed physical items per player (purchasing disallowed when reached)

dota_metadata_min_games_for_avg_stats.help_text: Games required on a hero for average KDA to be valid and calibrated

dota_neutral_initial_spawn_delay.help_text: Time after 0:00 to spawn the first wave of creeps.

dota_neutral_spacing_radius.help_text: Range that neutrals will be spaced apart from each other.

dota_neutral_spawn_fx_timing.help_text: Time before neutral spawns to play effects.

dota_neutral_spawn_interval.help_text: Time between neutral creep camp respawns, starting at 1:00.

dota_ogs_report_interval.help_text: When in 'heartbeat' dota_ogs_report_vprof mode, the number of seconds between reports

dota_ogs_report_vprof.help_text: Control reporting of vprof data to ogs. 0: no report, 1: database report at end of game, 2: report every dota_ogs_report_interval seconds, 11: like 1, but fake report to console (for testing), 12: like 2, but fake report to console (for testing).

dota_ogs_report_vprof_fraction.help_text: If nonzero, then only one in this many servers will run vprof if dota_ogs_report_vprof is set.

dota_pause_cooldown_time.help_text: Number of seconds before a player is allowed to pause again

dota_pause_count.help_text: Number of times a player is allowed to pause the game

dota_pause_force_unpause_time.help_text: Number of seconds after which the game will automatically unpause

dota_pause_same_team_resume_time.help_text: Number of seconds resuming is restricted to the same team, after that either team can pause

dota_pause_same_team_resume_time_disconn.help_text: Number of seconds resuming is restricted to the same team if someone disconnected, after that either team can pause

dota_poor_network_detection_debug_level.help_text: Spew verbosity for poor network condition detection

dota_poor_network_detection_loss_pct.help_text: Packet loss threshold (0...1) for declaring a QoS stat interval to be 'bad'

dota_poor_network_detection_max_interval.help_text: Max number of bad intervals to count for a player

dota_poor_network_detection_min_interval.help_text: Player must have at least N bad intervals to count

dota_poor_network_detection_num_interval.help_text: Number of QoS stats intervals that must be 'bad' on each team.
Number of QoS stats intervals that must be 'bad' over the whole match.

dota_post_game_report_time.help_text: Time after the signout completes that we can still report and commend players, given the lobby id

dota_post_game_survey_player_count.help_text: The first N player id slots will be surveyed for match quality

dota_postgame_finish_replay_time.help_text: How long to wait after the end scoreboard panel to finish the replay

dota_quit_after_game.help_text: Quit after a game is completed, do not hibernate

dota_quit_on_hibernate_after_lobby.help_text: Always terminate after receiving a lobby, do not rehibernate

dota_realtime_stat_keyframe_interval_s.help_text: How often the server generates a keyframe of realtime stats

dota_realtime_stat_update_interval_s.help_text: How often the server updates internal game state and checks whether it should update the GC with realtime stats

dota_reconnect_idle_buffer_time.help_text: How much extra time the player has after reconnecting before he gets marked as AFK.

dota_recorder_use_default_items.help_text: Use default items only when recording heroes.

dota_replay_upload_script.help_text: Name of the script used to upload replay files

dota_restrict_partner_type_chat.help_text: Disallow chat between certain partner types

dota_server_allow_custom_games.help_text: Where this server makes itself available to host custom games:  0 = both regular and custom, 1 = regular only, 2 = custom only

dota_sf_game_end_delay.help_text: Delay before the end game panel animation (XP + scoreboard) starts once a game is ended

dota_spectator_graph_interval.help_text: Seconds between each graph update.  Each update will update one stat for one player.

dota_spectator_graph_networking_enabled.help_text: 0 to disable graph data networking for perf comparisons.

dota_spectator_graph_networking_override.help_text: 1 to enable graph data networking for all clients.

dota_spectator_graph_per_player_stats.help_text: Set to enable creation and networking of per player stats.

dota_spectator_graph_send_interval.help_text: Seconds between each graph update and tranmission.

dota_speech_hardcoded_respeak_delay.help_text: Certain speech concepts will not be said more than once per (n) seconds. Set to 0 to disable.

dota_speech_missinglane_call_interval.help_text: Bots will call 'missing' on a lane no more than once per this many seconds.

dota_speech_missinglane_call_threshold.help_text: Bots will call 'missing' on a lane if an opponent has been gone this many seconds.

dota_speech_proximity_interval.help_text: Once per (n) seconds, one hero will poll for TLK_ALLY_NEARBY. Because there are ten heroes this means each hero will poll once per n*10 seconds. Set 0 to disable altogether.

dota_speech_proximity_radius.help_text: Heroes nearer than this distance will poll for the TLK_ALLY_NEARBY concept.

dota_speech_proximity_radius_enemy.help_text: Enemy heroes nearer than this distance will poll for the TLK_ENEMY_NEARBY concept.

dota_speech_shop_dawdle_interval.help_text: Play 'dawdling' line from shopkeeper after hero has been in shop this long.

dota_speech_shop_enter_interval.help_text: At least this many seconds must pass between shopkeeper greeting someone to his shop.

dota_spew_connected_players.help_text: If enabled, server will spew connected player GC updates

dota_statmanager_debug.help_text: Enables debug spew for the stat manager. 0 = off, 1 = on, 2 = verbose.

dota_surrender_on_disconnect.help_text: If enabled, a team will surrender if all players on that team disconnect

dota_surrender_timeout.help_text: Delay after an entire team has disconnected before timing the game out.

dota_surrender_timeout_abandoner.help_text: Delay after an entire team has disconnected before timing the game out when someone has abandoned.

dota_surrender_timeout_all_abandoned.help_text: Delay after an entire team has officially left the game (not just disconnected from the server) before timing the game out.

dota_sv_ogs_itemevents.help_text: When enabled, this will handle logging to ogs of item events, otherwise it will omit this logging

dota_time_of_day_rate.help_text: Rate at which time of day changes relative to game seconds

dota_timed_hero_stats_initial_entry_time.help_text: The initial time offset before we get the values, this has the effect of not adding a 0 entry and adding an actual early game valid entry

dota_tutorial_percent_damage_decrease.help_text: Percentage decrease to apply on damage on the player character.

dota_unit_cache_npc_searches.help_text: Whether to reuse a unit's search cache every frame to avoid obstruction manager queries.

dota_unit_damage_event_window.help_text: Window (in seconds) that we track damage events for future health value extrapolation.

dota_unit_debug_acquisition_range.help_text: Shows the acquisition range for selected units (Green circle)

dota_unit_debug_attack_range.help_text: Shows the attack range for selected units (Red circle)

dota_unit_debug_vision_range.help_text: Shows the vision range for selected units (Teal circle)

dota_update_connected_players_check_time.help_text: How often the server should check if it needs to update the GC in seconds

dota_update_connected_players_send_time.help_text: Minimum send interval: Don't check for lobby vs game state discrepancies if we've sent a message within N seconds

dota_update_connected_players_urgency_bu.help_text: max send interval: tower state changed

dota_update_connected_players_urgency_di.help_text: max send interval: player disconnects, relevant leaver actions are predicted
max send interval: player disconnects, no relevant leaver actions predicted

dota_update_connected_players_urgency_ga.help_text: max send interval: We send a game state change, but lobby hasn't acknowledged it

dota_update_connected_players_urgency_he.help_text: max send interval: nothing has changed and lobby appears to be accurate
max send interval: player changer their hero

dota_update_connected_players_urgency_ki.help_text: max send interval: kill counts changed

dota_update_connected_players_urgency_ma.help_text: max send interval: mass disconnection has been detected

dota_update_connected_players_urgency_sp.help_text: max send interval: spectator count changed

dota_update_gc_connection_check_count.help_text: How many tries we check if the GC is still connected before terminating due to no response

dota_update_gc_connection_check_time.help_text: How often the server should check the GC is still connected

dota_update_gc_server_info.help_text: How often the server should check if it needs to update the GC in seconds

dota_upload_item_purchase_history_durati.help_text: match duration below which we will not upload item purchases

dota_upload_item_purchase_history_mmr_th.help_text: MMR below which we will not upload item purchases

dota_upload_match_state_history_duration.help_text: match duration below which we will not upload item purchases

dota_upload_match_state_history_interval.help_text: interval in seconds that we track game states

dota_upload_match_state_history_mmr_thre.help_text: MMR below which we will not upload game state history

dota_use_heightmap.help_text: Set to 0 to disable using heightmap when tracing vertical rays

dota_wait_for_players_battle_cup_present.help_text: Time to stay after waiting for players succeeds when displaying battle cup winners

dota_wait_for_players_completed_delay.help_text: How long to stay at the waiting-for-players UI after all players have loaded

dota_wait_for_players_failed_delay.help_text: How long to stay at the waiting-for-players UI after all players have loaded

dota_wait_for_players_to_load.help_text: If set, hero picking will be delayed until all players have loaded.

dota_wait_for_players_to_load_streaming_.help_text: Game will start after this time, even if all players haven't loaded yet

dota_wait_for_players_to_load_timeout.help_text: Game will start after this time, even if all players haven't loaded yet

dti_report_stddev_threshold.help_text: For network encoding stats, provide a notes field if field change count is above this many standard deviations for the average field change counts for the serializer.

engine_experimental_drop_frame_ticks.help_text: Experimental feature to skip ticks when the client is catching up in low frame rate situations.

engine_no_focus_sleep_vconsole_suppress.help_text: When VConsole is in the foreground, don't trigger engine_no_focus_sleep behavior

engine_platform_name_extended.help_text: Platform the engine is running on.

engine_rendersystem_init.help_text: Rendersystem option requested (changing this does not change the rendersystem).

engine_rendersystem_used.help_text: Rendersystem option in use (changing this does not change the rendersystem).

ent_show_contexts.help_text: Show entity contexts in ent_text display

ent_steadystate_batchsize.help_text: Max number of entities to transmit to player

ent_steadystate_cooldown.help_text: Time in seconds after player state changes before steady state changes can occur.

ent_steadystate_delay.help_text: Time in seconds without network state changes until an entity is considered for trickle updates

ent_steadystate_interval.help_text: Rate at which entities can be trickled to players

entity_log_load_unserialize.help_text: Output unserialization of entities on map load. 0 - off, 1 - client/server, 2 - server, 3 - client

filesystem_buffer_size.help_text: Size of per file buffers. 0 for none

fish_dormant.help_text: Turns off interactive fish behavior. Fish become immobile and unresponsive.

fog_override.help_text: Overrides the map's fog settings (-1 populates fog_ vars with map's values)

fog_override_enable.help_text: Use fog_override convars instead of world fog data

fog_volume_debug.help_text: If enabled, prints diagnostic information about the current fog volume

fow_degree_fade_in_rate1.help_text: FoW area fade in rate #1 (greater than 1 is faster)

fow_degree_fade_in_rate2.help_text: FoW area fade in rate #2 (greater than 1 is faster)

fow_degree_fade_in_rate_midpoint.help_text: FoW area fade out rate midpoint (0.0 - 1.0)

fow_degree_fade_out_rate1.help_text: FoW area fade out rate #1 (greater than 1 is faster)

fow_degree_fade_out_rate2.help_text: FoW area fade out rate #2 (greater than 1 is faster)

fow_entity_reveal_unseen_radius.help_text: Radius in world space to reveal around all viewers from unseen state, regardless of visibility.

fow_entity_reveal_unseen_time.help_text: Seconds over which an unseen area is revealed by radius checks, 0 is instant.

fs_report_long_reads.help_text: 0:Off, 1:All (for tracking accumulated duplicate read times), >1:Microsecond threashold

func_nav_blocker_obstacle.help_text: If true, a func_nav_blocker will create a navigation avoidance obstacle.

g_debug_constraint_sounds.help_text: Enable debug printing about constraint sounds.

g_debug_transitions.help_text: Set to 1 and restart the map to be warned if the map has no trigger_transition volumes. Set to 2 to see a dump of all entities & associated results during a transition.

g_physics_use_block_solver.help_text: Use block solving for constraint entities

gameevents_showevents.help_text: Dump game events to console. (1 = Show Signaling, 2 = Show Posting also).

gamestats_file_output_directory.help_text: When -gamestatsfileoutputonly is specified, file will be emitted here instead of to modpath

gc_secret_key.help_text: Secret key for authenticating with the GC

host_framerate.help_text: Set to lock per-frame time elapse.

host_limitlocal.help_text: Apply cl_cmdrate and cl_updaterate to loopback connection

host_showcachemiss.help_text: Print a debug message when the client or server cache is missed.

host_timescale.help_text: Prescale the clock by this amount.

input_button_code_is_scan_code.help_text: Bind keys based on keyboard position instead of key name

input_forceuser.help_text: Force user input to this split screen player.

instant_replay_history_limit.help_text: Maximum amount of minutes to save history (0 is unlimited).

instant_replay_history_limit_low.help_text: Maximum amount of minutes to save history on low memory (32 bit) systems (0 is unlimited).

item_debug_validation.help_text: If set, CEconEntity::ValidateEntityAttachedToPlayer behaves as it would in release builds and also allows bot players to take the same code path as real players.

items_game_use_gc_copy.help_text: If set, items_game.txt will be stomped by the GC.

iv_debugbone.help_text: Debug bone name for interpolation spew of CAnimationState.

lightquery_debug_indirect_lighting_fast.help_text: 0 = standard sampling, 1 = fast sampling, 2 = ultra-fast sampling

mapcyclefile.help_text: Name of the .txt file used to cycle the maps on multiplayer servers

mat_material_frameupdate_limit.help_text: Maximum time in ms to spend initializing shaders for materials each frame.

mem_incremental_compact_rate.help_text: Rate at which to attempt internal heap compaction

mem_test_each_frame.help_text: Run heap check at end of every frame

mem_test_every_n_seconds.help_text: Run heap check at a specified interval

mp_allowspectators.help_text: toggles whether the server allows spectator mode or not

mp_chattime.help_text: amount of time players can chat after the game is over

mp_clan_ready_signal.help_text: Text that team leader from each team must speak for the match to begin

mp_clan_readyrestart.help_text: If non-zero, game will restart once someone from each team gives the ready signal

mp_fadetoblack.help_text: fade a player's screen to black when he dies

mp_feetyawrate_max.help_text: How many degrees per second that we can turn our feet or upper body when we're outside the max body yaw.

mp_forcecamera.help_text: Restricts spectator modes for dead players

mp_friendlyfire.help_text: Allows team members to injure other members of their team

mp_restartgame.help_text: If non-zero, game will restart in the specified number of seconds

mp_timelimit.help_text: game time per map in minutes

mp_tournament_whitelist.help_text: Specifies the item whitelist file to use.

mp_waitingforplayers_cancel.help_text: Set to 1 to end the WaitingForPlayers period.

mp_waitingforplayers_restart.help_text: Set to 1 to start or restart the WaitingForPlayers period.

nav_area_max_size.help_text: Max area size created in nav generation

nav_create_area_at_feet.help_text: Anchor nav_begin_area Z to editing player's feet

nav_create_place_on_ground.help_text: If true, nav areas will be placed flush with the ground when created by hand.

nav_displacement_test.help_text: Checks for nodes embedded in displacements (useful for in-development maps)

nav_drag_selection_volume_zmax_offset.help_text: The offset of the nav drag volume top from center

nav_drag_selection_volume_zmin_offset.help_text: The offset of the nav drag volume bottom from center

nav_draw_area_bgcolor.help_text: RGBA color to draw as the background color for nav areas while editing.

nav_draw_limit.help_text: The maximum number of areas to draw in edit mode

nav_edit.help_text: Set to one to interactively edit the Navigation Mesh. Set to zero to leave edit mode.

nav_generate_compute_lighting.help_text: If true, compute lighting for this area.  Otherwise, just set to 1/2.

nav_generate_fencetops.help_text: Autogenerate nav areas on fence and obstacle tops

nav_generate_fixup_jump_areas.help_text: Convert obsolete jump areas into 2-way connections

nav_generate_incremental_tolerance.help_text: Z tolerance for adding new nav areas.

nav_max_auto_area_size.help_text: Max size in x/y of any auto-generated nav area

nav_max_view_distance.help_text: Maximum range for precomputed nav mesh visibility (0 = default 1500 units)

nav_quicksave.help_text: Set to one to skip the time consuming phases of the analysis.  Useful for data collection and testing.

nav_select_allow_blocked.help_text: When selecting an area under nav_edit, allow area marked as blocked.

nav_select_arc.help_text: Set to change selection trace to be an arc instead of a line.  Value 1 should give a reasonable arc.

nav_select_hull_category.help_text: Restrict area selection to areas that can support a hull of the given category

nav_select_hull_height.help_text: Restrict area selection to areas that can support a hull of given height

nav_select_hull_radius.help_text: Restrict area selection to areas that can support a hull of given radius

nav_show_area_connections.help_text: Show connections to selected area when true

nav_show_area_info.help_text: Duration in seconds to show nav area ID and attributes while editing. (-1 = never hide)

nav_slope_limit.help_text: The ground unit normal's Z component must be greater than this for nav areas to be generated.

nav_slope_tolerance.help_text: The ground unit normal's Z component must be this close to the nav area's Z component to be generated.

nav_solid_props.help_text: Make props solid to nav generation/editing

nav_test_find_nearest.help_text: Calculate the nearest point on the navmesh to the trace point.  Uses selection from nav_select_hull_*.

nav_test_find_nearest_clear.help_text: Calculate the nearest point on the navmesh to the trace point.  Uses selection from nav_select_hull_*.

nav_test_find_random_connected.help_text: Demonstrates finding random points that are connected in the nav mesh to the start point.

nav_test_loop_string_set.help_text: Set to 1-3 to place endpoints of test string.

nav_test_path.help_text: Calculate and draw a path from player/camera position to the test position.

nav_test_path_lock_goal.help_text: Lock the pathfinding goal to the current intersection point.

nav_test_path_lock_start.help_text: Lock the pathfinding start to the current intersection point.

nav_test_path_opt.help_text: Enable path optimization for nav_edit_path paths.

nav_test_search_lattice.help_text: Demonstrates searching hexagonal lattice over nav mesh.

nav_volume_debug.help_text: Draw or print debug information about nav volume queries.

nb_debug_history.help_text: If true, each bot keeps a history of debug output in memory

nb_debug_known_entities.help_text: Show the 'known entities' for the bot that is the current spectator target

nb_freeze.help_text: Stop all NextBots from moving only

nb_head_aim_resettle_angle.help_text: After rotating through this angle, the bot pauses to 'recenter' its virtual mouse on its virtual mousepad

nb_head_aim_resettle_time.help_text: How long the bot pauses to 'recenter' its virtual mouse on its virtual mousepad

net_compressvoice.help_text: Attempt to compress out of band voice payloads (360 only).

net_max_foreign_packets.help_text: Maximum amount of foreign packets (no established connection) allowed per frame before we discard

net_maxcleartime.help_text: Max # of seconds we can wait for next packets to be sent based on rate setting (0 == no limit).

net_maxroutable.help_text: Requested max packet size before packets are 'split'.

net_p2p_listen_dedicated.help_text: Should dedicated server listen for new-style P2P?

net_p2pconnection_linger_time.help_text: How long p2p connection requests should linger before we completely ignore them

net_port_try.help_text: If unable to bind to initial port, how many more to try binding.

net_public_adr.help_text: For servers behind NAT/DHCP meant to be exposed to the public internet, this is the public facing ip address string: ("x.x.x.x" )

net_qospacketloss_percentage_threshold.help_text: Spew a warning if packet loss percentage is above this threshold

net_queued_packet_thread.help_text: Use a high priority thread to send queued packets out instead of sending them each frame.

net_restrict_showmsg_socket.help_text: If set, only net_showmsg spew for data inbound on this socket name e.g. client, server, etc.

net_showevents.help_text: Dump game events to console (1=client only, 2=all).

net_showmsg.help_text: Show incoming message: <0|1|2|name> where 1 == all and 2 == all except net_NOP

net_showpeaks.help_text: Show messages for large packets only: <size>

net_showreliable.help_text: Like net_showmsg, but only spew reliable messages

net_showudp.help_text: Dump UDP packets summary to console

net_splitpacket_minimum_ack_rtt_msecs.help_text: After sending last chunk of split packet payload, wait at least this many msecs after last activity before giving up

net_splitpacket_require_acks_threshold.help_text: If a splitpacket has more than this many fragments, use the reliable/ack based protocol

net_splitpacket_resend_time_msecs.help_text: Wait this many msecs before checking whether to send resend requests.

net_splitpacket_success_ack_count.help_text: If we get a completed splitpacket requesting acks, send the final 'success' ack this many times

net_splitrate.help_text: Number of fragments for a splitpacket that can be sent per frame

net_splitspacket_warning_threshold.help_text: If a splitpacket has more than this many fragments, print a warning to console

net_usesocketsforloopback.help_text: Use network sockets layer even for listen server local player's packets (multiplayer only).

nextlevel.help_text: If set to a valid map name, will change to this map during the next changelevel

p2p_lockdown_global_trust_everyone.help_text: Global level peer to peer control to trust everyone. Still requires a peer group handler to trust the user as well. [0 = force off, 1 = force on, -1 = Engine Controlled]

p2p_lockdown_global_trust_friends.help_text: Global level peer to peer control to trust steam friends. Still requires a peer group handler to trust the user as well. [0 = force off, 1 = force on, -1 = Engine Controlled]

panel_test_title_safe.help_text: Test vgui panel positioning with title safe indentation

particle_test_file.help_text: Name of the particle system to dynamically spawn

particles_multiplier.help_text: Multiply # of rendered particles by this for perf testing

phys_fast_report_contacts.help_text: when 1, fast path for collision reporting is implemented making triggers faster in some cases

phys_implicit_integarator.help_text: Use implicit integrator for gyroscopic forces

phys_reload_immediately.help_text: Set to 1 to reload resources and reconstruct physics of entities on the fly. May unexpectedly change behavior or crash the game, because game code is generally unaware of underlying resource reloads and may hold references to physics that may become invalid during resource reload. It is inherently harder for physics to deal with resource reloads because of persistent nature of objects being simulated (textures can be easily reloaded on the fly; if an entity holds a handle to a ragdoll body part, it may expect that handle to stay valid while the ragdoll exists)

phys_soft_contact_frequency.help_text: reaction frequency of a soft contact

player_debug_print_damage.help_text: When true, print amount and type of all damage received by player to console.

props_break_max_pieces.help_text: Maximum prop breakable piece count (-1 = model default)

props_break_max_pieces_perframe.help_text: Maximum prop breakable piece count per frame (-1 = model default)

pvs_debugentity.help_text: Verbose spew for this entity when doing IsInPVS computation.

pvs_flowtype.help_text: Flow through spawn groups for vis (0 == default, 1 == always visible, 2 == never visible.

r_always_render_all_windows.help_text: Always force all engine & tools to render

r_draw_particle_children_with_parents.help_text: Draw particle children with parents (-1=use gameinfo, 0=no, 1=yes)

r_drawblankworld.help_text: Render blank instead of the game world

r_drawpanorama.help_text: Enable the rendering of panorama UI

r_drawvgui.help_text: Enable the rendering of vgui panels

r_fallback_texture_lod_scale.help_text: Scale factor for requested texture size (texture streaming) - used for geo that doesn't have a precomputed UV density measure

r_force_zprepass.help_text: 0: Force z prepass off. 1: Force on. -1: Don't force

r_grass_density_mode.help_text: 0 = Density corresponds to blade existance, 1 = Density corresponds to blade height, 2 = Both 0 and 1

r_max_texture_pool_size.help_text: Upper limit on texture pool size.

r_occluder_overlay.help_text: Show the occluder depth buffer mip level. 0=off, 1=1st mip, 2=2nd mip, etc...

r_particle_debug_force_simulation.help_text: -1 for all asleep, 1 for all awake

r_particle_min_timestep.help_text: A minimum on particle simulation time, particle simulation happening more frequently than this will lerp.

r_particle_render_test.help_text: render particles 100 times and show perf

r_show_hipoly_draw_calls.help_text: Transparent wireframe overlay for draw calls with triangle count higher than specified number

r_show_zprepass_depth.help_text: Draw the depth from the depth pre-pass

r_show_zprepass_normals.help_text: Draw the normals from the depth pre-pass

r_showdebugrendertarget.help_text: Set the debug render target to show, 0 == disable

r_showsunshadowdebugrendertargets.help_text: Set to render sun shadow render targets

r_showsunshadowdebugsplitvis.help_text: Set to render sun shadow split visibility debugger

r_size_cull_threshold_shadow.help_text: Threshold of sun shadow map size percentage below which objects get culled

r_ssao.help_text: Set to use screen-space ambient occlusion

r_stereo_convergence.help_text: Sets the focal plane that is aligned with the monitor's surface

r_stereo_eye_separation.help_text: Wider eye separation results in greater depth perception

r_texture_lod_scale.help_text: Scale factor for requested texture size (texture streaming)

r_texture_pool_size.help_text: Total size of the texture pool in MB

r_texture_stream_mip_bias.help_text: Biases the mip level the texture streaming system choses to stream for each texture.

r_texturefilteringquality.help_text: 0: Bilinear, 1: Trilinear, 2: Aniso 2x, 3: Aniso 4x, 4: Aniso 8x, 5: Aniso 16x

r_vconsole_foregroundforcerender.help_text: When VConsole is in the foreground, force all engine & tools to render

r_zprepass_normals.help_text: 0: Use normals reconstructed from depth. 1: Output correct normals in z prepass.

ragdoll_prop_sleepaftertime.help_text: After this many seconds of being basically stationary, the ragdoll will go to sleep.

ragdoll_sleepaftertime.help_text: After this many seconds of being basically stationary, the ragdoll will go to sleep.

rate.help_text: Min bytes/sec the host can receive data

rcon_address.help_text: Address of remote server if sending unconnected rcon commands (format x.x.x.x:p)

rr_debugclassname.help_text: If set, rr_debugclassname will print only response tests where 'classname' corresponds to this variable. Use to filter for a specific character.

rr_debugresponseconcept.help_text: If set, rr_debugresponseconcept will print only responses testing for the specified concept

rr_debugresponses.help_text: Show verbose matching output (1 for simple, 2 for rule scoring, 3 for noisy). If set to 4, it will only show response success/failure for npc_selected NPCs.

rr_debugrule.help_text: If set to the name of the rule, that rule's score will be shown whenever a concept is passed into the response rules system.

rr_discrepancycheck.help_text: Set 0 to disable the [RESPONSELIB] warning messages.

rr_dumpresponses.help_text: Dump all response_rules.txt and rules (requires restart)

rr_followup_maxdist.help_text: 'then ANY' or 'then ALL' response followups will be dispatched only to characters within this distance.

rr_remarkables_enabled.help_text: If 1, polling for info_remarkables and issuances of TLK_REMARK is enabled.

rr_thenany_score_slop.help_text: When computing respondents for a 'THEN ANY' rule, all rule-matching scores within this much of the best score will be considered.

save_history_count.help_text: Keep this many old copies in history of autosaves and quicksaves.

sc_log_submits.help_text: Log out display list submits from scenesystem

scene_clientplayback.help_text: Play all vcds on the clients.

scene_forcecombined.help_text: When playing back, force use of combined .wav files even in english.

scene_maxcaptionradius.help_text: Only show closed captions if recipient is within this many units of speaking actor (0==disabled).

scene_print.help_text: When playing back a scene, print timing and event info to console.

scene_showlook.help_text: When playing back, show the directions of look events.

scene_showmoveto.help_text: When moving, show the end location.

scene_showunlock.help_text: Show when a vcd is playing but normal AI is running.

screenmessage_notifytime.help_text: How long to display screen message text

screenmessage_show.help_text: Enable display of console messages on screen. 1 = Enabled, 0 = Disabled, -1 = Enabled if vgui is not present

screenshot_prefix.help_text: Set the screenshot auto naming prefix.

skeleton_instance_smear_boneflags.help_text: Smear boneflags across the model.  Costs computation, but tests to make sure your bone flags are consistent.

smoothstairs.help_text: Smooth player eye z coordinate when traversing stairs.

snd_async_spew_blocking.help_text: Spew message to console any time async sound loading blocks on file i/o.

snd_autodetect_latency.help_text: Enable automatic buffer latency detection (requires driver support)

snd_mergemethod.help_text: Sound merge method (0 == sum and clip, 1 == max, 2 == avg).

snd_moviefix.help_text: Defer sound recording until next tick when laying off movies.

snd_new_visualize.help_text: Displays soundevent name played at it's 3d position

snd_report_stop_sound.help_text: If set to 1, report all sounds stopped with S_StopSound().

snd_report_verbose_error.help_text: If set to 1, report more error found when playing sounds.

snd_sos_show_block_debug.help_text: Spew data about the list of block entries.

snd_sos_show_groups_debug.help_text: Spew data about the list of block entries.

snd_toolvolume.help_text: Volume of sounds in tools (e.g. Hammer, SFM)

snd_vmix_show_input_updates.help_text: If set to 1, show all incoming updates to vmix inputs.

soundpatch_captionlength.help_text: How long looping soundpatch captions should display for.

soundscape_debug.help_text: When on, draws lines to all env_soundscape entities. Green lines show the active soundscape, red lines show soundscapes that aren't in range, and white lines show soundscapes that are in range, but not the active soundscape.

spec_freeze_time.help_text: Time spend frozen in observer freeze cam.

spec_freeze_traveltime.help_text: Time taken to zoom in to frame a target in observer freeze cam.

ss_voice_hearpartner.help_text: Route voice between splitscreen players on same system.

steamworks_sessionid_server.help_text: The server session ID for the new steamworks gamestats.

sv_allchat.help_text: Players can receive all other players' text chat, no death restrictions

sv_allow_lobby_connect_only.help_text: If set, players may only join this server from matchmaking lobby, may not connect directly.

sv_allow_wait_command.help_text: Allow or disallow the wait command on clients connected to this server.

sv_alltalk.help_text: Players can hear all other players' voice communication, no team restrictions

sv_alternateticks.help_text: If set, server only simulates entities on even numbered ticks.

sv_bonus_challenge.help_text: Set to values other than 0 to select a bonus map challenge type.

sv_client_cmdrate_difference.help_text: cl_cmdrate is moved to within sv_client_cmdrate_difference units of cl_updaterate before it is clamped between sv_mincmdrate and sv_maxcmdrate.

sv_client_max_interp_ratio.help_text: This can be used to limit the value of cl_interp_ratio for connected clients (only while they are connected). If sv_client_min_interp_ratio is -1, then this cvar has no effect.

sv_client_min_interp_ratio.help_text:
This can be used to limit the value of cl_interp_ratio for connected clients (only while they are connected).
              -1 = let clients set cl_interp_ratio to anything
 any other value = set minimum value for cl_interp_ratio

sv_client_predict.help_text:
This can be used to force the value of cl_predict for connected clients (only while they are connected).
   -1 = let clients set cl_predict to anything
    0 = force cl_predict to 0
    1 = force cl_predict to 1

sv_clockcorrection_msecs.help_text: The server tries to keep each player's m_nTickBase withing this many msecs of the server absolute tickcount

sv_cluster.help_text: Data center cluster this server lives in.

sv_consistency.help_text: Whether the server enforces file consistency for critical files

sv_debug_player_use.help_text: Visualizes +use logic. Green cross=trace success, Red cross=trace too far, Green box=radius success

sv_dota_auto_save_min_players.help_text: minimum number of players in the game to allow saves

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_download_stuck.help_text: We must download N megabytes within sv_dota_custom_game_cache_download_stuck_timeout seconds, or else we'll assume the download is stuck and give up
Every N seconds, we must make download progress of at least sv_dota_custom_game_cache_download_stuck_mb megabytes, or else we'll assume the download is stuck and give up

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_download_timeo.help_text: If we cannot finish downloading after N seconds, give up

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_lock_file_time.help_text: If we cannot acquire lock on shared cache in N seconds, give up and fail UGC install

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_shared_folder.help_text: Shared cache for downloaded custom game data.  (Dedicated server only)

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_work_folder.help_text: Directory for instance-specific temp data.  If this is empty (the default), it will be set using tmpnam()

sv_dota_speech_announcer_networking.help_text: Set to 0 to prevent announcer speech from being matched on the client; match it on the server instead, like the old way.

sv_downloadurl.help_text: Location from which clients can download missing files

sv_enable_delta_packing.help_text: When enabled, this allows for entity packing to use the property changes for building up the data. This is many times faster, but can be disabled for error checking.

sv_enableoldqueries.help_text: Enable support for old style (HL1) server queries

sv_extra_client_connect_time.help_text: Seconds after client connect during which extra frames are buffered to prevent non-delta'd update

sv_filterban.help_text: Set packet filtering by IP mode

sv_hibernate_postgame_delay.help_text: # of seconds to wait after final client leaves before hibernating.

sv_hibernate_when_empty.help_text: Puts the server into extremely low CPU usage mode when no clients connected

sv_infinite_ammo.help_text: Player's active weapon will never run out of ammo

sv_infinite_clips.help_text: Player's backpack will never run out of clips

sv_ladder_slack_z_mult.help_text: Difference in Z increases toward the middle of the slack ladder.

sv_lagcompensationforcerestore.help_text: Don't test validity of a lag comp restore, just do it.

sv_lan.help_text: Server is a lan server ( no heartbeat, no authentication, no non-class C addresses )

sv_log_onefile.help_text: Log server information to only one file.

sv_logbans.help_text: Log server bans in the server logs.

sv_logblocks.help_text: If true when log when a query is blocked (can cause very large log files)

sv_logecho.help_text: Echo log information to the console.

sv_logfile.help_text: Log server information in the log file.

sv_logflush.help_text: Flush the log file to disk on each write (slow).

sv_logsdir.help_text: Folder in the game directory where server logs will be stored.

sv_max_queries_sec.help_text: Maximum queries per second to respond to from a single IP address.

sv_max_queries_sec_global.help_text: Maximum queries per second to respond to from anywhere.

sv_max_queries_window.help_text: Window over which to average queries per second averages.

sv_maxcmdrate.help_text: (If sv_mincmdrate is > 0), this sets the maximum value for cl_cmdrate.

sv_maxrate.help_text: Max bandwidth rate allowed on server, 0 == unlimited

sv_maxroutable.help_text: Server upper bound on net_maxroutable that a client can use.

sv_maxupdaterate.help_text: Maximum updates per second that the server will allow

sv_memlimit.help_text: If set, whenever a game ends, if the total memory used by the server is greater than this # of megabytes, the server will exit.

sv_mincmdrate.help_text: This sets the minimum value for cl_cmdrate. 0 == unlimited.

sv_minrate.help_text: Min bandwidth rate allowed on server, 0 == unlimited

sv_minupdaterate.help_text: Minimum updates per second that the server will allow

sv_mover_maxslope.help_text: The maximum slope the player can overcome [-]

sv_mover_pogodampingratio.help_text: The capsule pogo stick damping ratio [-]

sv_mover_pogoextension.help_text: The capsule pogo stick extension to keep the player better grounded [%]

sv_mover_usecapsule.help_text: Should the mover proxy be a capsule shape?

sv_networkvar_perfieldtracking.help_text: Track individual field offset changes, rather than a single dirty flag for the whole entity.

sv_networkvar_validate.help_text: Validate each StateChanged against known offsets.

sv_noclipduringpause.help_text: If cheats are enabled, then you can noclip with the game paused (for doing screenshots, etc.).

sv_parallel_packentities.help_text: Set to 1 to use threading snapshot sending on listen servers, 2 for dedicated servers.

sv_parallel_sendsnapshot.help_text: Set to 1 to use threading snapshot sending on listen servers, 2 for dedicated servers.

sv_password.help_text: Server password for entry into multiplayer games

sv_pause_on_console_open.help_text: 1 = Pause the game when pressing ~ to open the console. CTRL+~ opens the console without pause.

sv_phys_debug_callback_entities.help_text: Print all entities that get touch callbacks. Each entity is printed only once.

sv_phys_sleep_enable.help_text: Enable sleeping for dynamic physics bodies.

sv_prop_door_max_close_attempts.help_text: Number of times blocked doors will try to close before becoming non-solid and forcing a close.

sv_pure_kick_clients.help_text: If set to 1, the server will kick clients with mismatching files. Otherwise, it will issue a warning to the client.

sv_pure_trace.help_text: If set to 1, the server will print a message whenever a client is verifying a CRC for a file.

sv_pvs_entity.help_text: If set, only allows this ent index to network (other than players and things that force sending).

sv_pvs_random.help_text: If set, objects blink in/out of pvs randomly.

sv_radial_vis.help_text: Use Radial vis for networking PVS checks.

sv_rcon_banpenalty.help_text: Number of minutes to ban users who fail rcon authentication

sv_rcon_maxfailures.help_text: Max number of times a user can fail rcon authentication before being banned

sv_rcon_minfailures.help_text: Number of times a user can fail rcon authentication in sv_rcon_minfailuretime before being banned

sv_rcon_minfailuretime.help_text: Number of seconds to track failed rcon authentications

sv_regeneration_force_on.help_text: Cheat to test regenerative health systems

sv_region.help_text: The region of the world to report this server in.

sv_reservation_grace.help_text: Time in seconds given for a lobby reservation.

sv_reservation_timeout.help_text: Time in seconds before lobby reservation expires.

sv_session_persister_mode.help_text: 0 = OFF, 1 = ON, 2 = w/SPAWN MANAGER, 3 = w/PLAYER & WEAPONS

sv_showladders.help_text: Show bbox and dismount points for all ladders (must be set before level load.)

sv_showlagcompensation.help_text: Show lag compensated hitboxes whenever a player is lag compensated.

sv_skyname.help_text: Current name of the skybox texture

sv_snapshot_unlimited.help_text: For debugging, don't throw away old snapshots so that if you break in debugger (on remote client or server) it won't require an uncompressed update to resume.  You may run out of memory of course...

sv_soundemitter_trace.help_text: Show all EmitSound calls including their symbolic name and the actual wave file they resolved to. (-1 = for nobody, 0 = for everybody, n = for one entity)

sv_steamgroup.help_text: The ID of the steam group that this server belongs to. You can find your group's ID on the admin profile page in the steam community.

sv_steamgroup_exclusive.help_text: If set, only members of Steam group will be able to join the server when it's empty, public people will be able to join the server only if it has players.

sv_strict_notarget.help_text: If set, notarget will cause entities to never think they are in the pvs

sv_sync_client_updates.help_text: (Only used when hosting xbox games). Send clients updates at the same time. This saves CPU because the server will encode and calc deltas on less frames.

sv_tags.help_text: Server tags. Used to provide extra information to clients when they're browsing for servers. Separate tags with a comma.

sv_temp_baseline_string_table_buffer_siz.help_text: Buffer size for writing string table baselnes

sv_timeout.help_text: After this many seconds without a message from fully connected client, the client is dropped

sv_timeout_when_fully_connected.help_text: Once fully connected, player will be kicked if he doesn't send a network message within this interval.

sv_timeout_when_fully_connected_customga.help_text: Once fully connected in a custom game game, player will be kicked if they don't send a network message within this interval.

sv_timeout_when_fully_connected_tourname.help_text: Once fully connected in a tournament game, player will be kicked if he doesn't send a network message within this interval.

sv_tracereffects_limit_general.help_text: Limits the number of visible tracers per frame

sv_update_master_server.help_text: Should we update the master server.

sv_usercmd_queue_spew_threshold.help_text: Spew warning if command queue has grown above this many backlogged commands.

sv_visiblemaxplayers.help_text: Overrides the max players reported to prospective clients

sv_voicecodec.help_text: Specifies which voice codec DLL to use in a game. Set to the name of the DLL without the extension.

sv_watchtransmit.help_text: Watch NetworkStateChanged info for this entity index.

sys_minidumpspewlines.help_text: Lines of crash dump console spew to keep.

tf_escort_score_rate.help_text: Score for escorting the train, in points per second

think_limit.help_text: Maximum think time in milliseconds, warning is printed if this is exceeded.

tv_allow_camera_man.help_text: Auto director allows spectators to become camera man

tv_allow_static_shots.help_text: Auto director uses fixed level cameras for shots

tv_autorecord.help_text: Automatically records all games as SourceTV demos.

tv_autoretry.help_text: Relay proxies retry connection after network timeout

tv_chatgroupsize.help_text: Set the default chat group size

tv_chattimelimit.help_text: Limits spectators to chat only every n seconds

tv_deltacache.help_text: Enable delta entity bit stream cache

tv_dispatchmode.help_text: Dispatch clients to relay proxies: 0=never, 1=if appropriate, 2=always

tv_dota_auto_record.help_text: If enabled, a demo will automatically be recorded for every game

tv_dota_auto_record_stressbots.help_text: If enabled, a demo will automatically be recorded for stressbot games

tv_enable_delta_frames.help_text: Indicates whether or not the tv should use delta frames for storage of intermediate frames. This takes more CPU but significantly less memory.

tv_grouprelaydatareliable.help_text: When enabled, this will collect all information for relay sending into a single datagram to ensure that the data stays together through a potentially large number of relays

tv_grouprelaydataunreliable.help_text: When enabled, this will collect all information for relay sending into a single datagram to ensure that the data stays together through a potentially large number of relays

tv_grouprelaydatavoice.help_text: Similar to tv_grouprelaydata, but controls whether or not the voice channels should be routed into the grouped data for the relays

tv_instant_replay_full_frame_build_threa.help_text: Build the full frames on a seperate job thread

tv_log_director_events.help_text: Log game events being considered by the director

tv_maxclients.help_text: Maximum client number on SourceTV server.

tv_maxrate.help_text: Max SourceTV spectator bandwidth rate allowed, 0 == unlimited

tv_nochat.help_text: Don't receive chat messages from other SourceTV spectators

tv_overridemaster.help_text: Overrides the SourceTV master root address.

tv_rate_multiplier.help_text: Multiply requested rate by this value to adjust Dota TV send rate

tv_relay_quit_after_game.help_text: Quit after a game has been relayed, do not hibernate

tv_relay_secret_code.help_text: When enabled, this will use a uniquely generated server code to authenticate relay to relay connections. This code is coordinated via the GC or some external means rather than by clients directly

tv_secret_code.help_text: When enabled, this will use a uniquely generated server code to authenticate relay connections. This code is coordinated via the GC or some external means rather than by clients directly

tv_title.help_text: Set title for SourceTV spectator UI

tv_transmitall.help_text: Transmit all entities (not only director view)

tv_window_size.help_text: Specifies the number of seconds worth of frames that the tv replay system should keep in memory. Increasing this greatly increases the amount of memory consumed by the TV system

vgui_drawfocus.help_text: Report which panel is under the mouse.

vgui_drawkeyfocus.help_text: Report which panel has keyboard focus.

voice_always_sample_mic.help_text: For systems experiencing a hang/stall when using voice chat.

voice_sequence_maximum_wait_time.help_text: When receiving packets out of sequence, wait this many seconds for missing sequences to arrive

vphysics_shadow_port.help_text: Use the ported version of physics shadow controller?

vr_anchor_allow_non_up_floor.help_text: Allows anchor teleportation onto walls and ceiling. NOTE: WIP, mostly broken!

vr_hand_left_attachment_rotation.help_text: Rotation offset from the base Attachment point (for testing)

vr_hand_right_attachment_offset.help_text: Rotation offset from the base Attachment point (for testing)

vr_hmd_positions_debug.help_text: Makes local player HMD avatar visible slightly in front of its actual position.

vr_spawn_at_player_start.help_text: Whether to spawn the player or the anchor at the info_player_start. (0 = Honor the info_player_start spawnflags, 1 = spawn at the info_player_start position)

z_door_reopen_interval.help_text: Closed doors can be re-opened after this amount of time

z_door_retry_interval.help_text: Interval at which blocked doors will try to reopen
